headline: JCP&L Begins Work to Boost Reliability for Thousands in Ocean and Burlington Counties
summary: Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L) has begun prepping land in central New Jersey for infrastructure upgrades that will enhance the regional power grid and improve service reliability for thousands of residents and businesses in Ocean and Burlington counties.

raw.headline: JCP&L Begins Work to Boost Reliability for Thousands in Ocean and Burlington Counties

headline: FirstEnergy Names Karen Kinslow Vice President, Pennsylvania Operations
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) has named Karen Kinslow as Vice President of Pennsylvania Operations, effective July 28. In this key leadership role, Kinslow will oversee the delivery of safe, reliable electricity to more than two million customers across the state. She will also lead the operational strategy that delivers an improved customer experience. Kinslow will report to John Hawkins, President of FirstEnergy Pennsylvania.
